container-title: This action brings up the Properties dialog
title: Select your server from the Applications list box, and then click the Properties button
You can use the default access and launch permissions or create custom permissions
Make sure that SYSTEM is in the launch and access permissions. If you are using the default access or launch permissions, use the Default Security tab to make sure these permissions contain SYSTEM
Make sure Expert Mode is selected on the View menu
Make sure Expert Mode is selected on the View menu
